description.overview: Industry-specific automation system designed for dental & vision insurance businesses. Includes lead capture funnels, automated follow-up sequences, appointment booking, customer communication workflows, and review generation. Built on proven best practices for the dental & vision insurance industry.

Pipeline for tracking leads to customers
ideal_for: Dental & Vision Insurance businesses wanting to automate operations
New dental & vision insurance businesses needing a complete system
Established financial services companies looking to scale
